name: Popout, Inc.
description: Developer of a multi-carrier shipping software designed to assist businesses to succeed through shipping. The company's platform provides an API and dashboard to assist merchants and platforms in getting real-time rates, printing labels, automating international paperwork, tracking packages, and facilitating returns, enabling businesses to find suitable delivery option that matches their requirements.
one_liner: Developer of a multi-carrier shipping software designed to assist businesses to succeed through shipping. The company's platform provides an API and dashboard to assist merchants and platforms in getting real-time rates, printing labels, automating international paperwork, tracking packages, and facilitating returns, enabling businesses to find suitable delivery option that matches their requirements.
